story:
Our Fundraising Campaign

What Is It?

Trans Bodies, Trans Selves is a book and outreach project intended to improve the lives of trans and gender nonconforming people. The book itself is a resource guide that brings together writing by prominent authors on the broad, multidimensional spectrum of trans and gender nonconforming identity, as well as on health, legal, cultural and social questions, history, theory, and more… all for the support of transgender, gender nonconforming, and gender-questioning people, their partners and families, students, professors, guidance counselors, providers, and others. It is being published by Oxford University Press in Spring, 2014.

Check out our table of contents and amazing authors!

What Do You Get For Your Donation?

Here’s what’s in it for you.  At various donation levels you will receive:

•  Copies of the book for yourself, friends, or family members.

•  A Transgender History E-book written by our history chapter author, Genny Beemyn, Director of the Stonewall Center at the University of Massachusetts. Due to space limitations, their chapter had to be shortened for the full book. Don't miss out on the full history of trans communities in the U.S.! 

•  The opportunity to donate books to individuals and organizations that would not otherwise be able to afford it.

And at all donation levels, from $1 to $1000, you get the warm fuzzy validation of knowing you helped get the book into the hands of those in need.

Where is the Money Going?

Glad you asked.

·  First, to cover expenses incurred during the four-year production leading up to publication including our web designer, two illustrators, and a professional editor, all of whom offered their services at reduced rates, and were necessary to logistically get the book done and in print.

·  Second, and more importantly, to support a national outreach project to improve the lives of trans and gender nonconforming people.  This project will expand on the publication of the book by enabling us to offer the book at reduced or no cost to individuals unable to pay, to schools, libraries, community centers, and other support services.  Also, the project will focus on the education of providers, community and online forums for the exchange of information and for support, to be a visible presence at national conferences, and to produce ongoing editions of the book as issues evolve.

A breakdown of costs for this campaign 

(if $50k goal is met with estimates of books purchased):

Approximate costs:

$14k – professional editor, web design, illustrators

$16k – purchasing (700) books to fulfill perks

$3.5k – shipping

$5k – indiegogo fees

$38.5k TOTAL

…which would mean $11.5k would go toward donating books to community organizations (nearly 600 books – in the hands of trans people around the country). And even more if we make over our goal.

Trans Bodies, Trans Selves has involved four years of work from hundreds of authors, contributors, advisors, editors, and volunteers who donated their time out of a desire to serve the trans and gender nonconforming community.  Other than the four people listed above, none of those involved are being compensated for their efforts. The 50+ authors, especially, deserve recognition for the significant energy and expertise they have put into this project. We wish we could pay them all what they deserve, but any amount would be minimal if shared among all. Any profits from the book once it is released this spring will be funneled into the non-profit and fulfilling its mission of education and sharing resources – most immediately, getting this book into the hands of those who cannot afford it.

Additionally, Oxford does not make any money from the fundraising and does not require that we raise money as a condition of publishing the book.

It is especially important to us that the money raised through the support of our community and allies all be directed back to supporting the community itself.

What is This Book Donation Campaign of Which You Speak?

Our primary goal is to donate or sell reduced cost copies of the Trans Bodies, Trans Selves book to individuals in need, schools, libraries, LGBTQ/Queer community centers, GSAs, and social service organizations.  Through money raised by donations, we are able to purchase the book from Oxford at a significant discount, and in turn get it to those in need at greatly reduced rates or even free. If we make our goal on indiegogo we will be able to donate hundreds of books. We negotiated with Oxford to get the lowest cover price possible so that the most people could afford the book.  However, the book is large, with over 20 chapters, and could not be sold for lower than $39.95. We also plan to offer reduced price copies at conferences. If you know of organizations that could benefit from donated books, please contact info@transbodies.com.

Non-Profit or Not Non-Profit?

Trans Bodies, Trans Selves is incorporated in New York State and is currently pending non-profit status. It is likely, but not guaranteed, that donations will be retroactively tax deductible when our non-profit status becomes official. We will be sending donation letters via email to all donors who give $250 or more. If you contribute less than this, you can claim deductions on your taxes without a letter.

So How Does it Get From Us to You?

Carrier pigeon, Pony Express, or silver-platter-carrying personal courier?

Shipping within the U.S. is included in book orders. We would love to get the book to people outside the U.S. but shipping price is less predictable. If you would like your book(s) shipped outside the U.S., please contact us about shipping price and we will add it to your total.

Got Questions?

Email us at info@transbodies.com

Thank You for Your Support!

It is our deepest hope that this book, and the project happening around it, make a major impact in improving the lives of trans and gender nonconforming people, our families, our communities, and the world at large… and we want to thank everyone so much for your support.

story:
The Basics

How does the Crossroads Guide to the Writing Life help writers-in-need?

Simple... we're giving away copies of the Guide to the Writing Life for supporting our scholarship fund, which will help writers-in-need attend the 2012 Crossroads Writers Conference. 

This is our fourth year with the conference and it's gotten better every time. The double-edged sword is that, as we've grown, more people have found out about what makes Crossroads special but we've had less room in the budget for scholarships. 

We have a stack of applications from people who really want to come to the conference but can't otherwise afford to, and without your help, we don't know how we'll get them here.

The applicants this year come from as far away as California and Philadelphia, but most are from around the Southeast--Alabama, Florida, Atlanta, Savannah and middle Georgia--which has been hit hard by the economic downturn. 

So whether you like writing, reading or just helping people accomplish their dreams--as cheesy as it may be to say aloud--then this is a great opportunity for you. 

What We Need

  • We have almost 75 applications for scholarships. To bring even 50 of them to the conference would cost more than $6000. 
  • The cost of designing and printing a first run for the Guide will cost almost $2000, which is a bargin. 
  • If we go over our goal, we'll split the amount between our scholarship fund for next year and the Young Writers Program, operated by the Office of Letters & Light, as a way to get high school students into National Novel Writing Month.
  • If we don't get to our goal, we'll put the money towards as many scholarships as we can afford. 

What You Get

Starting with the $15 level donation, you get a copy of the Guide to the Writing Life, which will be jam-packed with great stuff from the conference with special extras. 

Have a question you desperately (or at least somewhat) need answered? Well you could have your question--and your picture--in this first Guide to the Writing Life, answered by a pro.

Like our kickass poster? Well, you can get a special edition print autographed by all our presenting writers.

Forget writing, you just want a good burger. In fact, you want a burger named for you. Well, make a big enough donation and have one of the best burgers in town named for you at The Rookery. 

The Impact

Here's why these writers can't come to the conference without your help:

  • "I'm trying to climb out from under a mountain of debt. I'm also trying to save to pay cash for a car since I had to recently junk my car."
  • "I am homemaker (not by choice) and my husband works two jobs to support us. I am still very new to the writing experience and really need to hone my craft."
  • "I am a person who is legally blind. who is unemployed."
  • "I have been laid off numerous times in the past few years... In the meantime, I've only been able to find part-time minimum-wage jobs.

Here's why they say it's so important for them to attend: 

  • "Truly if I could anything that I wanted, it would be to write.  Unfortunately, real life interferes with that since my priority has to be helping to support my family."
  • "I would like to attend Crossroads for the infectious atmosphere that occurs with listening to, learning from, sitting next to and conversing with people who love to read and write just as much as you do."
  • "This conference will allow me to meet other local writers and help build my confidence to complete a novel and publish it."
  • "I'd like to meet more writers and become part of a larger community. Writing has mostly been an isolated experience for me and I'm only vaguely aware of what the writing community has to offer."

Other Ways You Can Help

We know you aren't rolling in dough, but you can still help. If you know someone--an individual, an organizaton or a business--that might want to help, let us know. 

And please share our project with your friends. This can make a real difference in a lot of lives. You can be part of that.

Thank you!

story: I am a writer, solo performer, and poet who has been awarded a month's residency at the Millay Colony of the Arts in Austerlitz, NY.  The residency will give me the opportunity to work on my book, "What Men Do" which addresses the issues of mentoring, personal development, class struggle, familial obligation, and race.  I have an agent for it and have spent the last four months working on a revised book proposal. I look forward to going back to the writing.   I am attempting to collect $800 to cover travel and shipping expenses.  For any donation over $25, I will write you a short piece on the subject of your choice. Anything less, a nice phone call.  :)  I'm also keeping a blog and am looking forward to getting out in nature and reconnecting with my natural rhythms.  Perhaps the ghost of Thoreau will visit me.   If you have any questions or care to see my bio, I can be reached at levandhawkins.com.  LeVan D. Hawkins

story:
Get in touch with history.

Learn time-tested skills and tactics.

Long before the era of tactical night sights, UAVs, and infra-red scopes, humanity fought its battles during the day and during the night. This project  aims to bring to the Western Reader priceless information on the night-fighting tactics and skills developed by the Red Army during what may have been, for the Soviets, the hardest year of the Second World War, condensed by Red Army command into a book – The Soldier and Squad in Night Combat.

We require a small sum of money to fund the translation of the book – first published by the Soviet Union's Voenizdat in 1942 – into English and preparing it for publication with DiLernia Publishing. The book is of interest for those in interest in military history, small-unit tactics or personal preparedness.

 

The translator, Boris Karpa, has previously translated into English books such as Vadim Shutikov's "The Entrenching Tool – A Lecture Course", and the Soviet manual, "Destroy the Enemy in Hand-to-Hand Combat", now available on Amazon Kindle.

story:
There is nothing convenient about being part of an uncommon move of God.

When you know that God has called you to do something you have two choices.  Make the decision to do it, or the excuse not to.  I had spent many years doing the latter.  Not in a blatant way.  More along the "I can make a rationalization to make myself believe it" sort of way.

My solution?  Write a book!  It's really God's solution...and here's why:

This book is about breaking free from everything that keeps holding you back.  It's not a self-help, here are the easy steps to prosperity, type of book.  In fact, if you are really interested in living out God's call on your life it is going to be harder sooner than later.

This is about being willing to have your life called out.  Everything, and I mean everything, called on the carpet.  To step out in faith that where God is calling you to, you will go.  No matter what.  To living a life sold out to the vision God has for your life instead of the "safe" version you are living now.  You know, the life that everytime you seem to get ahead something happens to knock you back.  

There is a reason for that.  If you are living outside of the the divine purpose God has for you it's not a matter of if...but when the house of cards will fold around you.

I know.  I've been there.  It's why I am here now. The message God laid on my heart when I read Haggai 1:9 changed everything for me.

 

Why Now?

I want to be very clear from the start.  When I say There is nothing convenient about being part of an umcommon move of God, I mean it.

I quit my job to write this book.

Not to be rogue and careless.  But rather to be intentional and obedient to the call God has placed on my life.

This campaign is to raise money to support my writing this book from the start.

 

You can LITERALLY help me write this book!

As I write this book I want you to be part of it.  Every step of the way.  This process will be an opportunity for you to journey with me as the book comes to life.  You will be able to follow my Come Back Bringing blog and add your feedback.  Share insights, ideas and get a behind the scenes view into the entire process.  We'll also partner in prayer, honoring God every single step of the way.

You will hear my heart.  The good days, the bad days and the hard days along the way. This book is going to the be the result of all of our obedience combined.  As God leads you to support the book and this movement you allow me to respond to the call God has placed on my life.

This book is about all of us.

Where we are now.  Where we need to be.  And how God is going to take us all there.

 

Your Response.

Would you walk WITH me?  Would you pray and respond to what God is asking of you to see this book come to life and this movement sweep our nation?

Thank you for being part of my life.  Many of you have prayed for this very day.  I wouldn't be here without those prayers.  Many of you have never met me, yet you know God is asking you to partner with me.

I look forward to walking this road with all of you.

 

The Campaign.

From the moment Haggai spoke the words that God has asked him to deliver to the time the people were obediently moving, responding and getting involved in God's vision for their life was specific.

It was 21 days.

Everything changed during that time.

So this campaign will be open for 21 days.

Will you partner with me?  Will you share this with everyone you know to do the same?

 

The Back Story.

It was the summer of 2007.  I was out of town going through training for my job.  My wife received a phone call from a family friend.  It wasn't meant to be anything more than a funny haha type of thing.  

Flash forward to February 5, 2012 and over five years later my wife and I had an extension site of Elevation Church meeting in our home.  If you had told me back when we received that phone call that this would have happened I would likely have told you that you were crazy.

By April 1, 2012 we had two Worship Experiences and 88 people in our home.  We baptized a dear friend in 35 degree weather in our driveway as the rain misted through us.

What we had known as normal was offically blown out of the water. 

Just a few short weeks later I found myself in the middle of a 10 day Daniel fast.  

And on April 22, 2012 my life changed.  I read Haggai 1:9 for the first time and it was like I was staring my past, present and future right in the face.

Three days later I sat in the parking lot of a grocery store on my lunch break and was writing as fast as I could in a journal.  It was that moment that I knew God was asking me to write this book.

Within two weeks God asked me to quit my job.  I did.  With nothing else lined up to support my family.  It seemed crazy to everyone outside my family.  But we knew it was time.  We knew that God had spoken.  And I had lived long enough trying my version.

And that brings us to today.  This campaign.  The movement that I believe God is going to sweep our nation with.  The words He has asked me to write.  

And that is where you come in.


This movement will require sacrifice and inconvenience for all of us. But at the other end of the obedience to respond to what God is asking of us I believe is a game changing, world changing movement.

There is nothing convenient about being part of an uncommon move of God.


I want uncommon. 

I want to see God move in a way only He can.

Will you join me?

story:
Through the end of the Because We Are Campaign on Thursday, net proceeds from all contributions will support these organizations equally. Join in the effort to take Because We Are's impact from the page to the world!

Hi. My name is Ted, and I've written a story I'd like to share with you.

It's a nonprofit novel, a tale of murder, mystery and redemption in the slums of Haiti. It's a story about two kids fighting against staggering odds to right a sickening wrong. And here's the kicker--it's not going to happen without you.

Just getting to this point has been a long journey. I started writing while working in Haiti in 2010 for a human rights organization in Bwa Nef, the slum community where the story is set. I crammed the rest of my writing into cracks in my schedule between finishing law school, taking the bar exam and setting out as a lawyer. And now that the manuscript is written, I'm excited to invite you to pack your bags and join me for the rest of the trip.

What's Because We Are about?

Here's the synopsis:

"When a mother and infant are murdered on the outskirts of Cite Soleil, Haiti’s most infamous slum, two unexpected detectives emerge: Libéte, a brash and headstrong girl of ten, and her brilliant but impoverished friend Jak. While the rest of their community moves on in the grinding struggle to survive, the children push deeper into a thicket of lies and deception that changes everything they know.

A lyrical novel of injustice and beauty set against a society in shambles, Because We Are: A Novel of Haiti."

        For a taste of what's in store, read an in-progress excerpt 

And who are you?

Indulge me as I shift to the obligatory third person:

"Discerning a call to work for peace and justice has changed Ted's life and taken him from the suburbs of Sacramento to living with Sudanese refugees in Cairo and onto his current home on the tough streets of North Philly. He and his wife Katharine live there, seeking to be faithful to their community, bringing people and causes at the margins of society to the center, and finding comfort in the knowledge that another world is possible."

 
Click above to connect and see more of Ted in Haiti 

Why tell this story?

Circumstances in Haiti demanded it. During my four months there, Haiti was buffeted by a major hurricane, the return of a brutal dictator, protests surrounding national elections, and the outbreak of imported cholera that continues to kill in droves—and all of this just months after the most unimaginable human loss in the January 2010 earthquake. I wanted to tell a story set against this incredible and heartwrenching backdrop.

Why should I read Because We Are?

Libéte--the main character (pictured on the cover). The book is really about her journey, of struggling against staggering difficulty and danger to solve a grisly murder. The book uses flashbacks to weave together a complex narrative of intersecting themes, characters and events that make her life just as fascinating as the underlying mystery. Why is Libéte who she is? What transformed her from a sweet little girl into a firecracker? What gives her such resolve to reach the mystery's end? Jumping between past and present begs new questions that drive the narrative forward as you discover more and more about this remarkable little girl.

Learn more of their backstory by clicking above 

What other books is Because We Are like?

It might be better to ask what my inspirations in writing were. Cry, the Beloved Country. What is the What. To Kill A Mockingbird. Native Son. The No. 1 Ladies Detective Agency series. A Thousand Splendid Suns. A Taste of Salt. The Dew Breaker.

These are all a part of the book's DNA, making it the unique read it is.

What's it really about?

Friendship. The struggle for justice in the face of impunity. Sacrifice for the community. Personal responsibility. Faith and doubt in light of tragedy. The foolishness of scarcity in a world of plenty.

It's a "nonprofit novel," right? So does any portion of my contribution get donated to an organization or cause in Haiti?

Your backing first goes to making the book great so that it can do good. Contributions will be used primarily to pay an editor and to cover costs tied to publicity, production and distribution. Everything donated above the fundraising goal (and all future profits from sales) will be donated to organizations in Haiti.

Look at it as if you're investing in a social enterprise. The better the book is, the more moving it is, the further its reach, the greater its sales, the more it can ultimately impact things on the ground in Haiti. 

 

A vision of things to come

What organizations will benefit?

I’m about the grassroots and backing smaller nongovernmental organizations (NGOs). Spending time in Haiti was jarring in part because of examples of wasteful NGO spending seen left and right. Smaller aid is often better, more effective, and more responsive to the needs of affected populations, and that's what this book will support.

Proceeds from sales beyond the Indiegogo campaign will go to organizations that I witnessed first-hand, groups like:

The Institute for Justice and Democracy in Haiti/Bureau des Avocats Internationaux

Haiti Partners

Mennonite Central Committee

Other Worlds

Fonkoze / Zafen and 

Plant with Purpose

These organizations do diverse work around education, healthcare, advocacy, justice reform, prosecuting human rights abuses, microfinance, and reforestation--all things I hope you're interested in supporting!

For transparency's sake, I'll be keeping an ongoing record of sales and donations on the book's website once it's released (www.becauseweare.com).

When can I read it?

The hope is that it will be published in the new year (at latest January 2013), in time for the third anniversary of Haiti’s quake. It's a wait, but it’ll be worth it!

Because We Are is about kids -- but is it for kids?

It's not. If it was a film, its content would probably put it in the hard "PG-13" range, with its language tripping it to an "R." No sex, some violence, and frequent bad language. (I felt I needed to add this little disclaimer for my grandmother's sake.)

If Because We Are is such a great book, why did you decide to self-publish rather than shop it around to agents and publishing houses?

Because We Are was created as a way to give back to a country and community that changed my life.

My goals were 1) to produce a story 2) that was worth telling with ordinary heroes in extraordinary circumstances 3) that you would want to read and 4) that would support organizations doing sound work in Haiti.   

Frankly, I didn’t want a big publisher gobbling up the margins of what would actually go back to Haiti. There are enough examples of credible, excellent fiction coming from self-published authors these days that I thought this decision would let me retain the integrity of the story and the vision behind it. Just as independent film tells exciting stories mainstream studios are often unwilling to back, indie publishing can do the same. 

Ultimately, it seemed more fitting that Because We Are is published because a rag-tag bunch of supporters like you wanted to use art to better the world.

I'd say that's a compelling story in its own right.

story:
Short Summary

As a self-published author, fundraising for things you need isn't always the easiest thing to do. Money donated will go towards book trailers and creative swag that can be given out for giveaways and blog tours, signings and events. My intentions are soley for marketing and getting my books noticed!

What I Need & What You Get

My goal is to raise $700 by early December. It's a long stretch, but with your help we can make it possible. In return, I will be giving away signed copies of my book, beaded bookmarks, key necklaces, and personalized t-shirts.

The Impact

Every self-published author's dream is to see their book in stores. With this extra push of marketing for my novel, I can finally see that dream come true.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, it is perfectly okay. What are other ways you can help?

  • Simply asking a friend, a family member, or even an employee about my fundraiser helps a lot. Take advantage of the SHARE buttons as well.

 

Thank you, and Happy Reading!

-N

Click here


 The book is also found on Lulu!!

Click here




// Download the whole book as as PDF for free! //

 


 

"Hi, my name is Simon Zingerman. Two months ago, I graduated from a graphic design university here in Sweden. As my final exam work I decided, not only to design a book, but to write it as well. However crazy that might sound, I actually pulled it off and in the end got it printed.

My idea was to produce a book that celebrates the people with courage and innovative ideas. A 'inspiration-lexicon' if you like. The plan was to compile the stories that have inspired me into believing in my own ideas/visions. By re-telling anecdotes from lecturers, results from interviews and search results through the web/magazines/books - I deliver stories, free to interpretate. I truly hope that my chosen 'favorites' will continue to inspire others to dare take the step, and get the courage to do something different.

With this book I wanted to find new way to discover where we get inspiration from. I wanted to break the traditional boundaries/patterns.
I simply asked myself; Why couldn't a pre-school teacher get inspiration for his or hers work by reading what a butcher did to sell more pork? Inspiration comes from the most remarkable places. A stupid idea can give birth to a smart, and vice versa."



The book is called We All Need Heroes. It’s filled with 120 short stories of people and their creative solutions, meant to inspire and entertain the reader. These stories come from all around the world and are both classic anecdotes and new untold ones. It includes everything from successful business ideas to everyday inspiration and smart solutions. Ideas I wish I had introduced or been part of myself. And in my eyes, these people are all heroes – hence the name of the book. I’ve been gathering these stories by travelling, reading books/magazines, listening to teachers/speakers/lecturers, making interviews, watching documentaries, eavesdropping on the train/bus and much more. This is a collection of three years of inspiration, made possible by my curiosity.

THE CHAPTERS

Absurd yet true
Awesome marketing
Clever business
Dumb but brilliant
Food for thought
Good hearted
Hidden messages
Re-inventions
Simple solutions
Smart but douchey
Smart Savers
Spread of Joy
Stories of Timing
Stupid stuff, Stupid audience
Success from Failures
Sustainable treats
The Bitter Truth
Third world brilliance
When people connect



I need your help to finish this book, make it available world-wide and to create a community around it. The donations I recieve at IndieGoGo will be used for the following:

  • Fine-tune

    - Hire a professional proofreader (for perfect language)
    - Improve the text-layout

  • Publish the book!

    - An investment for publishing agreement
    - Publish as paperback, hardcover and e-book

  • Create a community

    - Pay for web design (coding, template)
    - Pay for server and domain




I am shipping world-wide. Shipping price is included in the donation.

  • $5 – Your name in the credits (website)

  • $10 – Receive the E-book

  • $15 – Credits + E-book

  • $30 – Magnetic bookmark

  • $50 – Credits + E-book + Bookmark

  • $100 – Signed limited edition hard-cover book!

  • $150 – All of the above = Credits + E-book + Bookmark + Signed Book

 

 


For the record; I’m no author and neither am I an expert in English language. So in advance – sorry about the grammar. I’m a newly graduated graphic design student from Sweden, who simply loves tales of the brave and foolish people. When I’m not busy trying to take over the world with my projects, I spend time collecting inspiring stories I come across. After meeting and interviewing people both during my time in the U.S. and Sweden, I’ve come to realize that we in general carry around some really interesting things. If not a funny anecdote or urban legend, then a self-experienced story of great value. The problem with the latter is that these might never be retold and hence die out. The idea of We All Need Heroes was born. I believe in the power of sharing. Whether it’s knowledge, creativity or a cold beer. And that’s really what this book is all about – sharing. My idea is to spread these new and old stories, full access to all. The finished book is filled with awesome, inspirational and fun stories of people and their creative solutions from all around the world. It includes everything from successful business ideas to everyday inspiration and smart solutions. Ideas I wish I had introduced or been part of myself. Most of the stories I’ve found can be applied to any line of business. The audience for this book is pretty much anyone looking for a fun and inspiring read. So, what’ s the purpose of We All Need Heroes then? See these stories as a bunch of puzzle pieces. I give you the raw material, the rest is up to you and your imagination. I give examples of possible moral, but of course they’re free for interpretation! By showing the greatness of others I strengthen myself in my profession. These projects and people have encouraged me to follow my crazy dreams and simply do what I want with my career. This book will have done its job if it affects you in a way that makes you improve one or two things on Monday morning.



No matter if you are an entrepreneur, part of a working team, a student or someone thinking of starting your own business – this book will most likely inspire you. The stories might be told in a completely different line of business than the one you’re from, but the main idea behind them and the essence of finding new ways to tackle problems – are all universal. The idea for you as a reader is to pretty much never know what to expect. What determines what kind of experience you get from your reading depends only on yourself, where you are in life and what your needs consists of right now. This allows this book to always be up-to-date. You can pick it up at any time, and most likely will a story you didn’t care for earlier now generate some action on your part. To draw an analogy: A music band you never thought you’d be listening to five years ago, is perhaps today one of your favourites. These projects and people have encouraged me to follow my crazy dreams and simply do what I want with my career. This book will have done its job if it affects you in a way that makes you improve one or two things on Monday morning.

story:
My Story

Hello, my name is Tiera Nicole.  I would like to first say thank you for showing an interest in my campaign.  You will never fully understand what this means to me. I am an up and coming writer/director/producer and theatre trained actress.  The Love Sex & Baggage concept initially started out as a web talk show idea last year and has evolved into this wonderful masterpiece that I have spent the past nine months working on.  I have plans to further take some of the stories from the book and turn them into short films to be submitted to local, regional, and national film festivals; and your contributions can pave the way for those goals to come to fruition.

 

This book is NOT your grandma's love story.  It is thought provoking, jaw dropping, erotic and intense.  From the first few pages, you will find yourself sitting on the edge of your bed with anticipation to see what happens next.  This book highlights the challenges we all face in relationships but set in situations that may be unconventional  to some.  As an artist, I pride myself on thinking outside of the box and I hope you will join me outside of it as well.

 

(to find out more about how it all got started, please feel free to visit my blog site; http://tieranicole.blogspot.com or my you tube channel; www.youtube.com/tieranicoletv)


Excerpts From the Book

The book is broken down into three chapters; Ch. 1- LOVE, Ch. 2- SEX, and Ch. 3- BAGGAGE, and every story within each chapter directly relates to the chapter title.  For a little tease of what you have to look forward to, I've included two excerpts from the book.  The first excerpt is from the LOVE chapter and the second one is from the BAGGAGE chapter.  The SEX chapter is just too juicy to give away. :)

 

 

LOVE IS BEAUTY

 

"We said our last goodbyes to the lingering guests and walked to the valet to retrieve our car.  I hadnï¿½t realized how sleepy I was until I snuggled into the passenger seat and Larry started caressing my leg.  Although we only had about a thirty minute drive home, I closed my eyes and decided to enjoy a small cat nap because I knew once we got in the house, Larry would pounce all over me and I would need all the rest I could get.  I had just nestled into a good sleep when I heard the tires of the car screech and I jolted out of my slumber just in time to see a tree collide with the front of our car.  I donï¿½t recall an impact but I do remember hearing my name being screamed over and over.

 

ï¿½ZAHRIA! ZAHRIA! BABY CAN YOU HEAR ME?!! PLEASE ANSWER ME BABY!! Iï¿½M SORRY BABY! ANSWER ME PLEASE!ï¿½

 

I finally came to and screamed out in agony as the pain seared through my body. ï¿½Larry,ï¿½ I whimpered weakly.  ï¿½I canï¿½t feel my legs. I canï¿½t feel my legs.ï¿½

 

ï¿½Itï¿½s ok baby. Itï¿½s ok.  Hold my hand,ï¿½ he reached out his bloody hand and grabbed mine. ï¿½Help is on the way.  Itï¿½ll be ok. Itï¿½ll be ok.  Just talk to me, Zah,ï¿½ he said through tears. ï¿½Zahria?! Zahria?! ZAHRIA PLEASE SAY SOMETHING! Please donï¿½t leave me! Iï¿½m sorry!ï¿½

 

 

BAGGAGE TO DIE FOR

 

"When I finished, the floor and newspapers were soaked in gasoline.  I said a quick prayer that the gas stove upstairs had been running long enough to fill the house by now and do what we needed it to do.  I sat down next to her and she was still trembling, so I wrapped my arms around her and held her tight. ï¿½I'll love you forever.  Amen,ï¿½ I whispered in her ear as I lit the match."

 

Pretty intense stuff, huh?


What I'm Askng For

In order for any of this to happen, I must raise $8,000 for this campaign.  Here is how it breaks down:

 

$3,000- Production of the Book (cover design, text layout, binding, printing, and ebook ISBNs & uploading)

$5,000- Promotional/Marketing Tools (website, book tour/release party, advertising, etc)

 


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand times are hard and monetary help may not always be readily available to everyone (hence why I am here.. ;) )  So just by you passing on the information you have read today to just ONE other person besides you and your dog (Sorry, Fido can't contribute.. lol), I will be forever grateful.  Also if you follow me on twitter, www.twitter.com/iam_tieranicole, to stay abreast of everything that's going on in my world, that would also be appreciated as well.  Again, thank you for taking the time to contribute today. *SMILES*

My Story
Hello, my name is Tiera Nicole.  I would like to first say thank you for showing an interest in my campaign.  You will never fully understand what this means to me. I am an up and coming writer/director/producer and theatre trained actress.  The Love Sex & Baggage concept initially started out as a web talk show idea last year and has evolved into this wonderful masterpiece that I have spent the past nine months working on.  I have plans to further take some of the stories from the book and turn them into short films to be submitted to local, regional, and national film festivals; and your contributions can pave the way for those goals to come to fruition.
 
This book is NOT your grandma's love story.  It is thought provoking, jaw dropping, erotic and intense.  From the first few pages, you will find yourself sitting on the edge of your bed with anticipation to see what happens next.  This book highlights the challenges we all face in relationships but set in situations that may be unconventional  to some.  As an artist, I pride myself on thinking outside of the box and I hope you will join me outside of it as well.
 
(to find out more about how it all got started, please feel free to visit my blog site; http://tieranicole.blogspot.com or my you tube channel; www.youtube.com/tieranicoletv)



Excerpts From the Book
The book is broken down into three chapters; Ch. 1- LOVE, Ch. 2- SEX, and Ch. 3- BAGGAGE, and every story within each chapter directly relates to the chapter title.  For a little tease of what you have to look forward to, I've included two excerpts from the book.  The first excerpt is from the LOVE chapter and the second one is from the BAGGAGE chapter.  The SEX chapter is just too juicy to give away. :)
 
 
LOVE IS BEAUTY
 
"We said our last goodbyes to the lingering guests and walked to the valet to retrieve our car.  I hadnï¿½t realized how sleepy I was until I snuggled into the passenger seat and Larry started caressing my leg.  Although we only had about a thirty minute drive home, I closed my eyes and decided to enjoy a small cat nap because I knew once we got in the house, Larry would pounce all over me and I would need all the rest I could get.  I had just nestled into a good sleep when I heard the tires of the car screech and I jolted out of my slumber just in time to see a tree collide with the front of our car.  I donï¿½t recall an impact but I do remember hearing my name being screamed over and over.
 
ï¿½ZAHRIA! ZAHRIA! BABY CAN YOU HEAR ME?!! PLEASE ANSWER ME BABY!! Iï¿½M SORRY BABY! ANSWER ME PLEASE!ï¿½
 
I finally came to and screamed out in agony as the pain seared through my body. ï¿½Larry,ï¿½ I whimpered weakly.  ï¿½I canï¿½t feel my legs. I canï¿½t feel my legs.ï¿½
 
ï¿½Itï¿½s ok baby. Itï¿½s ok.  Hold my hand,ï¿½ he reached out his bloody hand and grabbed mine. ï¿½Help is on the way.  Itï¿½ll be ok. Itï¿½ll be ok.  Just talk to me, Zah,ï¿½ he said through tears. ï¿½Zahria?! Zahria?! ZAHRIA PLEASE SAY SOMETHING! Please donï¿½t leave me! Iï¿½m sorry!ï¿½
 
 
BAGGAGE TO DIE FOR
 

"When I finished, the floor and newspapers were soaked in gasoline.  I said a quick prayer that the gas stove upstairs had been running long enough to fill the house by now and do what we needed it to do.  I sat down next to her and she was still trembling, so I wrapped my arms around her and held her tight. ï¿½I'll love you forever.  Amen,ï¿½ I whispered in her ear as I lit the match."
 
Pretty intense stuff, huh?






What I'm Askng For
In order for any of this to happen, I must raise $8,000 for this campaign.  Here is how it breaks down:
 
$3,000- Production of the Book (cover design, text layout, binding, printing, and ebook ISBNs & uploading)
$5,000- Promotional/Marketing Tools (website, book tour/release party, advertising, etc)
 



Other Ways You Can Help
I understand times are hard and monetary help may not always be readily available to everyone (hence why I am here.. ;) )  So just by you passing on the information you have read today to just ONE other person besides you and your dog (Sorry, Fido can't contribute.. lol), I will be forever grateful.  Also if you follow me on twitter, www.twitter.com/iam_tieranicole, to stay abreast of everything that's going on in my world, that would also be appreciated as well.  Again, thank you for taking the time to contribute today. *SMILES*

story:
WHAT I DO 

I sit in public and private settings with a 1917 Corona typewriter and a sign that reads, "Poems about anyone or anything". People come and make their request, and I type a poem for them.  I call this process of writing, Poeming.  I started poeming ten years ago.  It started as a party game, a way to flirt, a way to make people smile.  Now its a lifestyle, a passion that has saved me from deep depression and isolation.  It is a unique way of sharing love, of providing blessing.  It has given me the greatest sense of peace I've known; despite that I've been living in a van and basically homeless the whole time.

I'm very good at empathizing with people and space.  So many of these poems don't get posted online because they draw so much nuance form the moment, that you "had to be there" for the beauty of it to be fully felt.  If you read it you'd think "What?", while the person it was written for would be in tears. This is why ultimately it has to be Video taped, so that you can witness the environment and exchange the poem speaks for.  Please check out my website to get a sense of this work and know how this is true. www.poemswhileyouwait.com 

 
WHAT THIS PROJECT NEEDS:

A COMPUTER
   This project has accumulated well over a thousand poems and some twenty hours of video.  I do not have the basic tools I need to process all this work. A computer will allow me to process this material, create and maintain an effective website on which to share all this work, sell products and promote services.  It will allow me to create weekly entries on the wonderful life of poetry on the streets.  It will also allow me to start producing and sharing video.

VIDEO RESOURCES: Gopro camera, Microphone, etc
Ultimately this project NEEDS to be documented on video.  I can not emphasize this enough.  The poems that come out of this process are very good, it’s true, but the interactions that occur around the poems are real gold.  Most everyday people shed tears of laughter, love, and release.  I'm so good at giving voice to their personal sentiments, that many of these poems don't really stand alone, and are not posted, because they reference, and draw their nuance, from the conversation, both spoken and silent, between me and my audience.  IT NEEDS TO BE DOCUMENTED.

BOOKMAKING RESOURCES: Printer, Paper cutter, booklet stapler,etc.

Without writing another poem, I’ve enough material to make no less then ten books of twenty poems each, all of the quality found on my current site, www.poemswhileyouwait.com.  Most of the hundred plus poems on that site I would deem book worthy, and keep in mind I have several hundred more to go through. I've not even gone through all the poems from two months of poeming in Portland (summer 2010), or Burning Man 2010, I've gone through little more then half the poems from Paia this past winter and only just cracked the nut on the summer collection from here in Boulder, Plus a bunch more from various places and times.  There's a lot of work here.

Having a computer, printer and proper book making supplies will give me the ability to create endless quick-books, hand-made chapbooks, and greeting cards.  I will also make two hundred stab-and-stitch books of fine paper, cloth, photos, and decorated with love.


This project is my heart and soul. Thank you so much for your interest.  

http://www.poemswhileyouwait.com/

story:
What is a Sussex Trug?

The Sussex Trug is a wooden basket made almost exclusively in one small area of East Sussex, using natural, sustainable, local materials. The village of Herstmonceux in particular has been associated with its production for around two hundred years.

About the book

For more than twenty years I've been running The Truggery, a workshop making and selling traditional Sussex Trugs in Herstmonceux. During that time I've amassed a vast amount of historical information, anecdotes and pictures relating to trugmaking. With the craft in decline I feel it is important to have a written record of something that has played such a significant part in the history of our little village, before trugmaking disappears forever.

The Sussex Trug: Form, Function and Craft is a book for anyone interested in our rural heritage or in gardening or traditional crafts. In it you’ll see how this basket originated out of the geographical surroundings, how we source the raw materials, and how a trug is made, step-by-step. 

 

 

How funding will help

I’m working with an experienced publishing team to turn my research into a fascinating and beautiful book. At 192 pages, it will be richly illustrated with archive  and specially commissioned photography and artwork, and printed on gorgeous wood-free paper with a hardback binding. Your contribution will help pay for the production costs of the book, and turn a long-standing dream of mine into a reality.

As a founder member of the Association of Sussex Trug Basket Makers, it's my hope that publishing this book will bring a greater appreciation of the craft and raise funds to train a new generation of trugmakers. To offer your support, please take a look at the range of perks on offer, including signed advance copies, trugmaking workshops and author talks for your club.

Other ways to support the project

If you’re not in a position to crowdfund, you can still help by spreading the word about my book among your friends and family – thank you!

story:
Hi!  Thanks for visiting my book fundraising page:) 

A little bit about my project:

'The Reverie Bubble' is the second in a series that follows my debut book 'Amsterdam Angel' and continues the adventure.  Without giving away too much this book will take you on adventure to three continents just like the first:)  During the writing of this book my long term vision became more clear:  

The books were written to help people with similar struggles or simply give a different perspective on living and learning about this thing called life.  

With the first book the book parties that were thrown evolved into charity events for various causes. Building on this experience, the intention I've set forth with the series is to create a charitable foundation as the ending goal, while the books creatively describe the journey that I took to get there.  

The money raised through these campaigns helps me to achieve my dreams of publishing my books.  The grateful and humble feelings your generosity produced during the last campaign led me to the decision of wanting to pay it forward and do what I could to help others.

Some of the causes the first book raised funds for included:

  • A gay homeless shelter destroyed by Hurricane Sandy 
  • The Joseph A. Wojczynski Memorial Scholarship Fund for dance students                
  • Breast cancer research                                                                                                  
  • AIDS Research                                                                                                               
  • Orphan children in South Africa who are HIV+                                                            

To get the second book out my initial costs are :

$2000 for professional editing, proofing and publishing

$2000 to purchase books

*Anything more would go toward marketing and advertising in the form of ads, as well as book promotional and charity events.  

I would like to extend a special thanks for contributing to my campaign in the form of a few gift offerings described to the right that details what you will receive with your contribution. 

In closing, there are other ways your support equally matters if you're not able to support financially.  I would greatly appreciate aid spreading the word by posting a link to this campaign on your Facebook pages and/or email it to your family and friends.

I would also be grateful for help to plan a book party in your city.  I will come to you with books in hand and all the proceeds would be donated to a charitable cause of your choice.  Every little bit adds up and I am eternally grateful for whatever you can give so that I may in turn give back. 

Thank You! 


Also! Vote on a cover!  Two possible options

Thoughts/suggestions? 

And please like my Facebook page and/or follow me on Twitter at the links below :)

                                                   xxx, jason

story:
no more waiting for your world to change

'the myth of your misfit' 


explores our authentic place in the human social tribe and how our experiences   

     impact our well-being  

        displace us from our natural roles         

   lead to maladaptive behaviours and coping 


 it was immediate, all the things that had happened to me  

                                         ...  now made sense          crisis survivor  


the book now being called the 'missing link'         between theory and practice


          a book to help you discover a ‘safe place’ to make meaning

    a must read to find your story of strength and resilience

      a book that shapes your current practice and methodology   


    

this simple, practical,  front line field theory is like having a psychological  AED for trauma & response in your pocket ... amazing!     paramedic

story:
SYLink lance sa Box au CES 2017 !

Après avoir rencontré un véritable succès au Consumer Electronics Show (CES) de Las Vegas 2016 – le salon mondial de référence dans la Tech grand public.

 

La France renouvelle l’expérience et SYLink Technologie prépare sa présentation au CES 2017 !

Emplacement au salon :
LVCC, South Hall 1 - 21743
(Cyber & Personal Security Marketplace)
 

SYLink Technologie est partenaire :

Internet - Web mondiale

Internet, outil de notre quotidien pour communiquer, rechercher, s’instruire, travailler et tant d’autres fonctions qui a envahi nos vies, nos informations personnelles et maintenant nos maisons.

Une véritable révolution qui a gagné nos foyers, avec toujours plus de nouvelles fonctionnalités. La révolution digitale à la portée de tous, modifie tous les jours notre quotidien, et pas une journée sans une nouvelle application ou un nouvel objet connecté. Il a fait partie de notre vie, et de celle de nos enfants.

Un monde hyper connecté

Dans lequel de plus en plus d’appareils de notre vie quotidienne disposent d’une connexion Internet. C’est l’IoT, dit l’internet des objets. L'ensemble de la famille utilise Internet pour surfer, acheter, jouer, voyager, visiter afin de profiter de tous les avantages de cette masse d’informations disponible.

Notre maison possède de plus en plus d’objet connectés, caméras, alarmes, serrures, cafetière… Dans les proches années à venir, notre maison sera notre extension numérique !

Cyber Attaques Informatique

Mais Internet présente des risques que nous appelons : Le Cyber Piratage On se protège contre les voleurs à base d’alarmes, de vidéo surveillance, et de domotique. Ces outils sont des alliés redoutablement efficaces, sont également très fragiles, car en cas d’une attaque d’un hacker, ils peuvent devenir vos ennemis et se retourner contre vous !

Imaginez être espionné à votre insu dans votre maison via vos propres caméras de surveillance, ou de votre alarme. Si vous pensez que les voleurs ne sont que ceux qui tentent de rentrer chez vous physiquement, vous vous trompez, ils sont peut-être déjà des nombreux à avoir visité votre intérieur, à vous espionner et ce, depuis le monde entier !

Les pirates informatiques tentent l’intrusion via Internet et toutes les vulnérabilités se trouvent appliquées à ce modèle. Vol de vos coordonnées bancaires, détournement de vos informations privées en vue d’usurpation d’identité, et bien plus !

Solution - Box de sécurité

 SYLink propose une solution simple, efficace et ergonomique pour protéger sa maison ou sa société, grâce à un dispositif unique, de surveillance, d’alerte et de défense contre les intrusions-réseaux.

SYLink est une solution innovante basée sur les algorithmes les plus puissants au monde. Il scrute, analyse, détecte et vous alerte en cas de danger.

Le design révolutionnaire de SYLink offre une finesse et une mobilité sans compromis sur ses performances. Avec son interface intuitive et sa simplicité, plus besoin d’être un expert pour surveiller et comprendre son environnement Informatique.

Avec l’application conviviale SYLink mobile pour Smartphone vous piloté la sécurité de votre intérieur à tout moment.

 

SYLink Technologie Une vie connectée sécurisée !

Conception et R&D :


Prototype de développement


Prototype de développement

 

Rendez-vous du 05 au 08 Janvier 2017 - CES pour découvrir SYLink Technologie et son équipe !

Plus d'informations sur https://www.sylink.fr

Emplacement au salon :
LVCC, South Hall 1 - 21743
(Cyber & Personal Security Marketplace)

story:
I'm asking all those who supported the development and creation of the "Relationship Dismount" to do the same for my latest relationship book idea, "The Holographic Relationship: A Deeper Look into the Spiritual Meaning Behind Intimate Relationships". This book will be designed to go into the spiritual purpose behind intimate relationships, using examples ranging from world religions all the way to quantum mechanics. Most people know all too well the potentially negative impact of societal rules on intimate relationships. The societal relationship norms/contructs  are usually passed on by friends, and family as a means of being seen and accepted as normal. This book will try to open our minds to an even deeper understanding/purpose for interacting in today's high paced technologically driven society.  So in the same way that I honored everyone who donated to the Relationship Dismount book project, by placing the names of donators in the book's acknowledge Segment:,  I will do the same for all those who share a piece of themselves with me to bring this work to fruition as well. 

I am asking for $15,000 to help develop the next phase, which includes but is not limited to writing, copy editing, graphics, printing, audio book development, commercial video production shoot, formatting re-writes, artistic cover design, marketing, radio, and social media promotions. 

The Impact

The "Relationship Dismount..." Relationship workbook was simply volume one in a series of intimacy building books aimed at educating, healing and expanding the consciousness surrounding the rift between men and women within the world of relationships. I believe that better/more flexible  relationship models are the linchpin to solving all the worlds problems surrounding all forms of relationships. Please help me realize this dream by donating today!!

story:
What We're Doing

We're so excited to be releasing chapbooks by Beni Xiao, Jake Byrne and Megan Jones in Fall of 2017. We're all in love with these books already and we know you will be too, so we're hoping to raise funds to help us cover the costs of promoting, creating, printing and shipping all of these beautiful books to you—wherever you are! The incredibly talented Amy Frueh will be designing the covers for our Fall 2017 releases.

We're offering pre-sales for our forthcoming titles, scheduled to be printed in September, and a couple of unique opportunities to work closely on your own writing with our publishing team. You can also sign up for a lifetime subscription to Rahila's Ghost Press and receive every single chapbook we'll make from now until we meet the void. We promise, this is a GREAT DEAL!

RG is a labour of love and we're going to put as much of it into this project as possible. All funds raised will go towards the production of chapbooks, maintaining and operating the press and, most importantly, compensating our artists and writers to the best of our abilities. 

Who We Are

Mallory Tater - Publisher

Curtis LeBlanc - Managing Editor

Shazia Hafiz Ramji - Publicist

Adèle Barclay - Poetry Editor

Shaun Robinson - Poetry Editor

Selina Boan - Poetry Editor

Dominique Bernier-Cormier - Poetry Editor

Help Us Get The Word Out!

Indiegogo has a bunch of fancy sharing tools to make it really easy for you to share this campaign with your friends and family and anyone else you might think is interested in helping making awesome chapbooks happen. So please, spread the word!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Nilber Padilla. I am from Venezuela.

I am a writer; I am currently working on a book - a trilogy- and on other projects for TV (writing). 

I study Audiovisual Arts in College.

I have written several projects for TV shows in English. Among my contacts I have the CEO of an important Production Company in Los Angeles, CA. Who knows about my projects. As they know, what I have been through with my projects they offered me to package, budget and pitch, not only one but two of them, to TV Networks with a discount, for only $3,500. The real price for such service is $5,000 each project, but they'll package, budget and pitch two for the price I have mentioned.

If I achieve this goal I will not only have the opportunity to get my TV shows professionally pitched to TV Networks but if I get one of them acquired, I will have the opportunity to get more shows developed, additionally, when I earn some more money from my projects I can pay for my education in the Film and TV business in the New York Film Academy as I also want to develop some ideas I have in mind into screenplays for feature films.

Getting my two TV projects packaged, budgeted and pitched to TV Networks in the US may be the first step of my career as a writer and producer for TV and you, the contributors can make this dream come true.

What We Need & What You Get

I need $3,500 to pay for the service of budgeting, packaging and pitching to TV Networks in the US by professionals who really know the business of  the TV and Film industry. Due to huge work this Production Company does with TV Networks in the US, I am not allowed to use their name here but they are an important Corporation in Los Angeles, CA. A company with high trained professionals.
I have written several, about eight projects for TV and I'm still conceiving and writing more, the Production Company and I will be working together in order to chose the two most sellable options among all the projects that I have written. Once both options are chosen, they will package, budget and pitch them to TV Networks, so until now I know that two of my TV shows projects will be selected but I don't know which ones will be yet, that's the reason I haven't offered much details of my projects. I have also been recommended by the Production Company not to reveal information about my projects as TV Networks would desire to hold all confidentiality rights upon acquiring them, so I decided to name this project in Indiegogo "A Reality Show"
In case I don't reach the goal of $3,500, I will have to ask the Production Company to package, budget and pitch only one of my TV shows projects only for the money I get to reach from contributors.

The Impact

Reality Television has collapsed TV nowadays and more people are watching it. I do my best effort to get the best of my TV show projects as I try to make them entertaining but educative, keeping it cultural and of high quality through my writings and research.
I will certainly let you know when the two of my projects are selected and their names so you, the contributors can follow them up on TV when the final product is ready to be aired.

Other Ways You Can Help

I'm sure that many people there, right there where you are interesting in helping people to make their dreams come true, so please don't deny them the opportunity to help me to make mine real.
Thank for taking time in seeing my campaign first of all. If you contribute, you don't know how thankful I will feel about it.

story:
The 2014 Fundraising Campaign

The Badger Herald, in conjunction with the newly formed Badger Herald Alumni Association, is seeking alumni donations to fund the newspaper's efforts.

In 2013, the Herald transitioned from a print-focused model to an online-first effort, reducing print publication from 5 days per week to twice per week. The newspaper also moved to a smaller office on West Johnson Street in response to changing needs.

The paper remains fiscally solvent and on budget for this year, and its leaders are optimistic that they can help reshape the student media landscape, evidenced by the release of a top-notch site employing optimized design for tablet and mobile devices.

What We Need

The Herald has spent some funds in recent years replacing iMacs in the design department, but that budget has not gone far enough. Outdated photo and video equipment has limited what the organization can do creatively. And 10-year-old computers in the business and advertising departments still run off Linux, hampering their ability to run sales and billing.

In order of priority, your donations will be used to purchase:

  • An HD camera with a DSLR lens
  • Key 1TB storage devices
  • New PCs for business and ads

The Impact

Print is dying. We all know this. Whether it takes 5, 10 or 50 years, it's a fact. Every college newspaper in America will, at some point, face two simple options:

  1. Accept university or alumni funding to keep print alive
  2. Develop a web-focused editorial and sales model that makes sense for the times

The Herald, in an effort to maintain its independence, bravely chose the second choice. 

By making that move, our newspaper has done a great service to the UW community, as 44 percent of visitors to BadgerHerald.com in January did so on a mobile device. The decision is also a win for future Heralders, whose experiments in the digital space will surely be impressive to prospective employers.

But all of those facts don't discount the fact that the Herald can do a better job tapping into its alumni base, particularly for capital purchases. The newspaper has added to its bottom line for each of the past two semesters, but this spring, we want your help in ensuring the organization has the top-notch equipment it needs to become the greatest innovator in student media.

Other Ways You Can Help

It's no secret that many in the media world are hard up for cash. If you can't donate, please consider taking one of the following actions:

  • Share this campaign on social media
  • Email the link to friends from your Herald days
  • Recent grad? Ask your loving parents to donate as a late-ish graduation gift!
  • Like the Herald on Facebook or follow the newspaper on Twitter!

Or, if you would like to discuss broader ways you can support the Herald — through larger monetary donations or equipment — please email Kevin Bargnes at bargnes@gmail.com.

story:
Afghanistan is ranked the most dangerous country in the world for women. Moral crimes among women are on the rise, meaning women are being incarcerated for being the victims of sexual assault. Since 2001, several women's shelters and schools have been established with foreign funds, offering refuge for women who have fled domestic abuse. During the 2014 troop drawback, however, these shelters and programs have an uncertain future.

What will I be doing?  

I'm going to Afghanistan for four weeks to interview a woman who escaped an execution--an "honor killing"-- and to visit the largest women's prison in Kabul. I'll write two long-form magazine articles that I hope will give a nuanced and personal understanding of the plight of Afghan women during the 2014 troop drawback. My research will also include interviews with female MPs, human rights activists, and artists.The Americans have done a great deal to set up shelters and fund education, but in the new year, as foreign funding diminishes, the future of many women remains uncertain. It's to my advantage that Afghan women will be more open and intimate with me, as a female reporter, than with my male colleagues.

The above photograph is an image of  the woman who escaped an honor killing by taking refuge at a Marine Corps base. In the photo she's at a children's prison near the village of Marjah. Her sisters are begging her to return home. But she refuses because she knows she'll be killed.

The Elimination of Violence Against Women (EVAW) law, promulgated by President Hamid Karzai in 2009, criminalizes rape for the first time in Afghanistan's history. The state is now legally obliged to protect women from violence -- including forced and underage marriage and physical and verbal abuse. But the Afghan judicial system remains dysfunctional, and the implementation of the EVAW law is uneven.


Where Will My Money Go?

Cash is the only currency in Afghanistan. Your contribution will go to the costs of hiring a fixer and female translator. Hashmat, my fixer, costs $200 a day and includes a driver. A female translator costs $50 a day. Since I will be speaking to women, I'll have to pay for a separate female translator.

story:
¿Qué?

Erol. La sangre de las velkra es una novela de fantasía llena de emoción y sorpresas que no te dejará indiferente.

En un mundo de fantasía dominado por la superstición y la poderosa mano del emperador Laebius, el pequeño Erol crece junto a su familia ajeno a lo que el destino está a punto de depararle. La sombra de una nueva guerra que vuelva a asolarlo todo sigue oscureciendo las vidas de los habitantes del imperio, pues la feroz resistencia de los puncos, temibles guerreros indómitos que se niegan a someterse a la voluntad de Laebius, sigue suponiendo un peligro para todo aquel que desee llevar una vida pacífica.

Sin embargo, es el tenebroso bosque de Trenulk, hogar de las más salvajes y fieras criaturas, lo que preocupa a Erol y todos los que como él viven todavía cerca de sus centenarios árboles. En el interior del bosque, en el cual nadie se ha atrevido jamás a adentrarse, moran las belicosas tribus velkra, formadas por seres parecidos a hombres dotados de una fuerza sobrehumana que cada verano salen de su hábitat para arrasar cuantos asentamientos queden aún a su alcance…  

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Pedro J. Alcántara.

Nacido en Córdoba en 1991, estudió Filosofía durante dos años en la Universidad de Granada. Volvió a Córdoba, donde trabajó durante otros dos años como documentalista y redactor de artículos como escritor freelance para la Real Federación Andaluza de Fútbol. Es, además, colaborador en el periódico Córdoba Buenas Noticias, para el que escribe ocasionalmente. A día de hoy reside en Brno, donde trabaja desde finales de 2016 mientras sigue escribiendo en sus ratos libres.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 920€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán como una ayuda para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Erol. La sangre de las velkra que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Pedro J. Alcántara vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
Please scroll down and choose your favourite perk from the right sidebar, then hover over it and click on "GET THIS PERK".
 
 

Short Summary

The Marie Curie Alumni Association, representing over 8,000 outstanding researchers, is excited to launch the first book of the illustrated series, My Super Science Heroes, for kids aged 5-9 years.

The first book, Marie Curie and the Power of Persistence, uses a novel storytelling approach to bring this historical figure to life for readers both young and old. Written and illustrated as a dynamic superhero story, this book introduces children to important scientists and their key accomplishments in a fun and engaging way.

Children are constantly exposed to superhero role models who rely on supernatural powers, something to which kids cannot relate. By focusing on the scientist’s key personality trait—in this case, persistence—and that role in the heroes' success, we show children that great achievement is not limited to a select group of masterminds, but rather is within the reach of anyone.

Superheroes are important role models for children and this book series will introduce the young readers to the achievements of great scientists such as Marie Curie in a fun and engaging way. It will help children understand that, unlike being bitten by a radioactive spider, scientific achievement is a realistic goal, and celebrating these real-life heroes will encourage kids to explore the many possibilities a STEM program offers.

With your help, we can bring Marie Curie and the Power of Persistence into classrooms and onto bookshelves around the world to inspire a new generation of thinkers who can persist and save the day!

 

The Impact

 

Marie Curie and the Power of Persistence is not the first book to highlight the achievements of Marie Curie, but it is the first book to highlight her superhero powers. 

Children love epic adventures complete with heroes, villains, and incredible superpowers. This book delivers all of that with dynamic and infectious energy.

With the rapid growth of technological and scientific development, it is imperative that all children be exposed to the power of science as early and as often as possible.

When Marie Curie Researcher, Sebastiano Garroni, brought his four-year-old daughter into his lab and asked if she wanted to be a researcher like her dad, she replied, "Sure Dad, but sorry, researchers are men and I am a little girl". Marie Curie is a perfect example of what anyone, especially four year-old litle girls, can achieve with a bit of enthusiasm, knowledge, and devotion to science.

Marie is exactly the type of role model we need to make science an exciting adventure for kids.

 

What You Get

  • Curl up on the couch with your kids before bedtime or in a reading circle in your classroom with this beautifully illustrated 32-page hardcover children's book featuring super science hero Marie Curie.
  • Select the Experiment Package, and you'll get the hardcover book, ebook, experiments you can do at home or in the classroom, colouring printables, and learning resources to continue the science fun at home or in school.
  • Choose The Big Bang reward and you'll get everything in the Experiment Package plus a Marie Curie coffee mug, a customized notebook, and the winning artwork from the Create Your Own Superhero Element—Radium and Polonium Contest (see contest instructions below). 

 

1. Experiment Package—FEATURED

50€ /$50 includes the hardcover book, ebook, hands-on experiments, colouring pages, and additional learning questions and guides to help your children take Marie Curie's story to the next level. FREE US and EU shipping.

                                  

 

2. A Super Science Hero Thank You

10€ /$11 receive the behind-the-scenes updates about the My Super Science Heroes book series and a PDF colouring printable of Marie Curie.

 

3. Ebook Only

15€ /$17 get the ebook for your Kindle, iBook, or other e-reader device and share the magic of Marie Curie's discoveries with your children.

4. Book + Ebook—Early Bird (SOLD OUT)

27€ /$29.50 includes the hardcover book and ebook. Only 25 are available so get this deal and save 8€ as a reward for backing the project before everyone else. FREE US and EU shipping.

5. Book + Ebook

35€ /$38 includes the hardcover book and ebook so you can take Marie Curie from the bookshelf to your favorite mobile device. FREE US and EU shipping.

6. The Big Bang

75€ /$80 includes the hardcover book, ebook, everything in the Experiment Package, a coffee/tea mug with Marie Curie artwork, a customized lab notebook, and a 4x6 postcard with the Radium and Polonium Contest winner's artwork (contest details below). FREE US and EU shipping.

7. School Kit

250€ /$280 includes 10 hardcover books, ebooks, everything in the Experiment Package, and a teacher's guide so you can bring the lessons of Marie Curie into the classroom. FREE US and EU shipping.

 

8. Meet a Scientist

1250€ /$1400 includes 20 hardcover books, ebooks, everything in the experiment package, the teacher's guide, and a Marie Curie researcher will come to your school and share his/her love and passion for science and math. Help us inspire a new generation of scientists with this exclusive reward. FREE US and EU shipping.

 

Expenses and Timeline

See below for the breakdown of how we will spend the funds raised for this project. Creating, printing and shipping full-colour hardcover books is quite the endeavour!

The book will feature a cardboard cover covered with plastic-coated smooth matte paper with a glossy spotted UV paint that highlights some of the features of the illustration. 

We estimate the book to be published and delivered in November 2017. Just in time for Christmas AND to celebrate the 150th Anniversary of Marie Curie's birth.

 

Risks & Challenges

We acknowledge there are always obstacles to every experiment but like Marie Curie taught us, we will persist and accomplish our goals.

Our creative team is already deeply immersed in the development of the story and design and we expect to deliver on time this year to celebrate the 150 anniversary of  Marie Curie’s birth.

Should we experience any hiccups or need more time to publish the book, we will communicate clearly with all backers so you know when to expect Marie Curie and the Power of Persistence to show up in your mailbox.

The Marie Curie Alumni Association is committed to creating the My Super Science Heroes book series to inspire children to love science and math, but we cannot do it without your help.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

1. Share our campaign on your Facebook page

2. Leave a positive comment on My Super Science Heroes Facebook page

3. Follow us on Twitter @myscienceheroes

4. Send us your artwork in the Create Your Own Superhero Element—Radium and Polonium Contest

  • Design Marie Curie's radioactive elements radium and polonium, and bring them to life in a fun way. 
  • The winner will receive a FREE copy of Marie Curie and the Power of Persistence and 20 4"x6" postcards featuring the artwork.
  • Open to all children aged 5-9 years.
  • The winning artwork will be sent to every backer as part of the Big Bang reward tier.
  • Deadline: June 25, 2017.
  • The winner will be announced on July 6, 2017.
  • Submit your artwork here—http://tiny.cc/mariecontest

Use the social media share tools on this IndieGoGo page to help My Super Science Heroes reach more curious minds.

 

Meet the Team Behind the Book

Karla Valenti is a writer of children's picture books and middle-grade novels. She is originally from Mexico but has put down roots in the US, France, Japan and most recently Germany where she lives with her husband and three kids. 

You can check out her website, Facebook page and Twitter profile.

Annalisa Beghelli graduated at the University Institute for Architecture in Venice in 2006, then she moved to Milan where she lives with her family. In 2011 she approached the world of communication and publishing by attending the MiMaster—master for publishing illustrators in Milan, where she graduated in 2012.

You can check out the website of her creative studio.

Micaela Crespo Quesada is a researcher with a highly international background. She’s lived in five different countries and is currently in Switzerland where she works hard each day to raise two amazing multilingual kids as science and nature lovers and critical thinkers. She has a PhD in Chemical Engineering and during her Marie Curie Fellowship, she worked at the University of Cambridge (UK) to produce fuels from sunlight and water (that is, trying to do what plants have been doing since the dawn of times!).

João Rosa is a Portuguese scientist with a background in Molecular and Cell Biology. After a Ph.D. in Nanobiotechnology, he moved to Sweden to study DNA Nanotechnology. 

Valerie Bentivegna is currently pursuing her PhD in biophysics. She is exploring techniques that will enable mechanical studies on tissue models and monitor changes during cancer progression. Alongside her research, she enjoys communicating scientific topics in a musical and humorous way.

 

Thank You!
